scripts.obfuscate: rm -rf dist && find . -type f ! -path "./node_modules/*" ! -path "./.vscode/*" ! -name ".*" ! -name "package-lock.json" -print0 | xargs -0 -I {} sh -c 'mkdir -p "dist/$(dirname "{}")" && if [ "${1##*.}" = "js" ]; then npx terser "{}" -c arguments=true,toplevel=true -m -o "dist/{}"; else cp "{}" "dist/{}"; fi' -- {}
